EmailTemplate.name: Notify Leads TLD is changed
EmailTemplate.subject: Attention Target Launch Date is changed for {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Project_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Attention @users, the Target Launch Date on {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Project_Name__c} was changed from {!IPM_Project__c.Previous_Target_Launch_Date__c} to {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Target_Launch_Dates__c}.
